title: Project-Based Leadership Development Program for Mathematical Potential

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental math concepts (advanced level), data analysis experience, organizational management competencies
context.additional_context: A mathematics potential development program for corporate managers/leaders, designed with activity-centered learning implementable in limited technological environments (primarily smartphones), emphasizing problem-solving skills through learner collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement collaborative PBL projects to solve complex mathematical problems
Learners can discover and utilize hidden mathematical potential in everyday work contexts
Learners can observe peers' mathematical thinking processes and provide feedback by applying diagnostic perspectives

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
